description: Computes slope maps (e.g., of thickness) in a longitudinal study using FreeSurfer

inputs.name: QDEC Table File
inputs.description: (REQUIRED) QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points

inputs.name: Measurement
inputs.description: (REQUIRED) The surface input measure (e.g. thickness)

inputs.name: Hemisphere
inputs.description: (REQUIRED) Run one hemisphere: lh or rh or both

inputs.name: Subjects Directory
inputs.description: (REQUIRED) Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory

inputs.name: Compute Temporal Average
inputs.description: Compute and output the temporal average

inputs.name: Compute Rate
inputs.description: Compute and output the rate

inputs.name: Compute Percent Change Fit
inputs.description: Compute and output the percent change (w.r.t. tp1 from linear fit)

inputs.name: Compute Percent Change
inputs.description: Compute and output the percent change (w.r.t. tp1)

inputs.name: Compute Symmetrized Percent Change
inputs.description: Compute and output the symmetrized percent change (w.r.t. temporal average)

inputs.name: Save Stacked File
inputs.description: Save the stacked within subject file (time series)

inputs.name: Compute Intersected Cortex Label
inputs.description: Compute and output intersected cortex label

inputs.name: QCache Target
inputs.description: Create cache for QDEC (resample to subject <QCACHE>, e.g. fsaverage)

inputs.name: Residual Time Point
inputs.description: Residual time point (pass 1 for tp1 etc., pass 0 for average) to export

inputs.name: Smoothing FWHM
inputs.description: Smoothing at specific FWHM (required for percent change)

inputs.name: No Smoothing
inputs.description: Do not smooth the data

inputs.name: Time Column Variable
inputs.description: Variable name for time column variable (e.g. age) in QDEC table

inputs.name: Generic Time Ordering
inputs.description: Time points are ordered in QDEC file, assume time=1,2,3...

inputs.name: Input Label
inputs.description: Use pre-existing label for smoothing and to mask the output

inputs.name: Correct Jacobian
inputs.description: Use this flag when mapping area or volume maps to correct Jacobian

inputs.name: Filename for Temporal Average
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store temporal average

inputs.name: Filename for Rate
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store rate

inputs.name: Filename for Percent Change Fit
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store percent change fit

inputs.name: Filename for Percent Change
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store percent change

inputs.name: Filename for Symmetrized Percent Change
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store symmetrized percent change

inputs.name: Filename for Residual
inputs.description: Filename (without hemi ?h) to store residual

inputs.name: Filename for Stacked Measure
inputs.description: Filename to store stacked measure file

inputs.name: Output Label Filename
inputs.description: Filename to store within-subject intersected cortex labels

inputs.name: Intersected Labels
inputs.description: Intersect labels on <qtarget> (usually cortex labels)

inputs.name: Stacked Avg Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked avg maps on <qtarget>

inputs.name: Stacked Rate Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked rate maps on <qtarget>

inputs.name: Stacked PC1FIT Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked PC1FIT maps on <qtarget>

inputs.name: Stacked PC1 Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked PC1 maps on <qtarget>

inputs.name: Stacked SPC Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked SPC maps on <qtarget>

inputs.name: Stacked Residual Maps
inputs.description: Output stacked residual maps on <qtarget>

name: long_mris_slopes
author: FreeSurfer Developers
